ygData.subject: Vox Dead on Tarew Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and well met everyone. I am just postin a short message about Lady Vox being killed on Tarew Marr server (I think for the first time) I think I had
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and well met everyone.

I am just postin a short message about Lady Vox being killed on Tarew Marr server (I think for the first time)

I think I had the most fun time I have had in the game since release excitement. There were several bards there all in great need. People were screaming they needed a bard in their group (mainly for the mr and cold resist factors than mana) me being the lowest person there (i think) at 40th level and my first time on a huge adventure like this I was chain smoking :)

I know at least one of the bards that were there is on this list besides my self that being Maev.

Other bards oncluded Theog, Ryana Fendryl(spelling) and some other blueberries I didnt get the names. We had I think right at 40 people with us.

We cleared the ice giant priests magi etc. We got to her lair and I must say that she has one hell of an area ice spell :)

The ONLY bad part about it and Maev I know will have words on this was the loot randoming at the end. BIG FIGHTING on who should be in the random of each item. Other than that I was honored to be a part of it, speciallly at level 40.


I did take several sceen shots if anyone wants them only 2 of vox her self as I didnt really have the time to hit ANOTHER button. But they are neat none the less

If you want to know what she dropped I will list to the best of my knowledge(since I didnt win anyof it :)) if You dont want to know ill leave some spoiler space....

Tuldar 40th Bard (hail lady vox/you feel your skin freeze/ loading please wait/ Welcome to west freeport hehe wasnt THAT fast of a death but sure seemed like it)
Tarew Marr



spoiler space





spoil space
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.


To the best of my knowledge these are the items and stats that Lady Vox had on her:

Spear 13dmge 35 delay
Belt 10 str 10dex 10 agil and haste effect they said was broken
a 2handed hammer that proced the rune 3 spell
a 10 slot bag that reduced weight 100%
2 dragon teeth that either were for 49th necro pet research OR had one charge of the necro 49th pet spell ( i could never get a straight answer)


This is exactly correct if not EXTREMELY near to the stats of the loot on her.


Congrats to everyone who took part in her demise...

Thanks maev for you good points durring the horrible loot arguements at the end.
